alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 1:37PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, southern Pointe Coupee and western Iberville Parishes through 215 PM CST... At 133 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Henderson to 7 miles east of Catahoula to 10 miles east of Lake Fausse Pointe. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Additionally, the storm produced wind gusts in excess of 45 mph earlier when it moved through New Iberia. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Allen, New Roads, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Morganza, Erwinville, Ramah, Bayou Sorrel and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 127 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Torrential downpours are occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding of water on roadways. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
